description: incompl., many lacunae, end missing. 17th cen. Brockelmann, GAL, SII, 470 (30a). In the present ms., the title appears as Nasamat al-nafaḥāt...; the author's name Murād has been changed into ʻAlī by a different hand. (Alternate title: Laṭāʼif al-minan fī dhikr manāqib...). Incip.: ... الحمد لله وکفى ... و بعد فلما کان الحق جل اسمه
author: Azharī, Murād ibn Yūsuf Jāwīsh, active 17th century
alternative: Laṭāʾif al-minan fī dhikr manāqib al-sādah al-Bakrīyah wa-dhikr manāqib abīhim al-Shaykh Abā al-Ḥasan
title: Kitāb Nasmat al-nafaḥāt al-miskīyah fī dhikr al-baʻḍ min manāqib al-sādāt al-Bakrīyah : wa-sammaytuhu bi-ism ākhar Laṭāʾif al-minan fī dhikr manāqib al-sādah al-Bakrīyah wa-dhikr manāqib abīhim al-Shaykh Abā al-Ḥasan
creator: Azharī, Murād ibn Yūsuf Jāwīsh, active 17th century
subject: Sufis—Biography—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
